name: jettyio/cute-feline-detector-openai
description: Cute Feline Detector using OpenAI (DALL-E 3). Expands a prompt, generates an image, and judges how cute the cat is.

init_params.prompt: a fluffy orange tabby cat sitting in a sunbeam
init_params.judge_instruction: Is this image of a cute feline (cat)? Evaluate cuteness on a scale of 1-5 where 1=not cute at all, 5=extremely cute. Also confirm whether the image actually contains a cat. Explain your reasoning.

expand_prompt.system_prompt: You are a creative prompt engineer specializing in image generation. Take the user's simple prompt and expand it into a detailed, visually rich image generation prompt. Add specific details about lighting, composition, style, mood, and atmosphere. Keep it under 200 words and focus on visual elements that will translate well to an image.
